keyMoments.title: New Fish-Man Pirates Announce Takeover
keyMoments.description: The New Fish-Man Pirates, led by Hody Jones, initiate an island-wide broadcast announcing their takeover of Fish-Man Island. This marks the beginning of their open coup against the Ryugu Kingdom.
keyMoments.significance: This is the crew's transition from a conspiratorial group to an active revolutionary force attempting to overthrow the established government. It demonstrates their confidence and willingness to openly challenge authority.

reveals.information: The New Fish-Man Pirates seek to overthrow the Ryugu Kingdom and prevent Fish-Man Island's integration with the surface world
The crew uses public broadcasts and propaganda to announce their actions and intimidate the population
